Furniture.Name: Elevator
エレベーター
Furniture.Description: Place elevators on top of eachother to connect rooms on different floors

Furniture.Name: Table
テーブル
Furniture.Description: Put stuff on it and chairs around it

Furniture.Name: Glass Table
ガラステーブル
Furniture.Description: Enjoy the view of your feet while you work

Furniture.Name: 2m End Table
2m エンドテーブル
Furniture.Description: Approximately round

Furniture.Name: 3m End Table
3m エンドテーブル
Furniture.Description: Even more round

Furniture.Name: Cheap Chair
安い椅子
Furniture.Description: Uncomfortable plastic chair

Furniture.Name: Office Chair
オフィスチェア
Furniture.Description: Nice polstered chair, no wheels though

Furniture.Name: Couch
ソファー
Furniture.Description: Living Room Inc.

Furniture.Name: Bench
ベンチ
Furniture.Description: It's a bench

Furniture.Name: Small Heater
小型ヒーター
Furniture.Description: Humble heating unit for your basic office needs

Furniture.Name: Ceiling Fan
セリング ファン
Furniture.Description: Nifty ceiling fan, which not only looks cool, but also cools down the room! May cause noise pollution.

Furniture.Name: Radiator
暖房
Furniture.Description: Anti-winter machine

Furniture.Name: Ventilation
冷房
Furniture.Description: Anti-summer machine

Furniture.Name: Central Heating
セントラルヒーティング
Furniture.Description: Industrial strength central heating unit to heat up entire buildings. Optimal heating for 375 m^2.

Furniture.Name: AC Unit
電源ユニット
Furniture.Description: Industrial strength air conditioning unit to cool down entire building complexes. Has to be placed above ground. Optimal cooling for 375 m^2.

Furniture.Name: Industrial ventilation
業務用 冷房
Furniture.Description: This fan was designed to cool a room down to accomodate servers, i.e. not people

Furniture.Name: Old Computer
旧世代コンピュータ
Furniture.Description: More pixels than you can count on one hand!

Furniture.Name: Modern Computer
次世代コンピュータ
Furniture.Description: Modern computer for all your modern computer needs

Furniture.Name: HoloComputer
近未来コンピュータ
Furniture.Description: Welcome to the future! Where everything is a little less convenient

Furniture.Name: Cubicle wall
オフィスパーティション
Furniture.Description: Place these walls intelligenty to reduce noise around work spaces. Note that cubicle walls increase employee isolation.

Furniture.Name: Lamp
照明
Furniture.Description: Make sure your employees can see when they are working late or if you can't be bothered placing windows

Furniture.Name: Desk Lamp
デスクライト
Furniture.Description: For localized lighting improvements

Furniture.Name: Floor Lamp
フロアライト
Furniture.Description: Makes light, but is also in the way

Furniture.Name: Fluorescent lamp
蛍光灯
Furniture.Description: Perfect for lighting up shady basement rooms with little maintenance, not so great for anything else, though

Furniture.Name: Outdoor Lamp
外灯
Furniture.Description: Cozy lamp for all your avoid-tripping-in-the-dark-outside-at-night needs!

Furniture.Name: Vending Machine
自動販売機
Furniture.Description: Food generator

Furniture.Name: Fridge
冷蔵庫
Furniture.Description: Food generator

Furniture.Name: Stove
調理台
Furniture.Description: Cooks will use stoves to heat food. One stove per cook.

Furniture.Name: Serving Tray
トレイ
Furniture.Description: Cooks will fill serving trays with finished food so employees can eat it

Furniture.Name: Instant Coffee
インスタントコーヒーメーカー
Furniture.Description: You soak some brown powder in hot water and I guess you feel less tired at some point?

Furniture.Name: Coffee
コーヒーメーカー
Furniture.Description: Your standard ground coffee machine

Furniture.Name: Espresso Machine
エスプレッソマシン
Furniture.Description: Delivers high quality coffee by being noisy and consuming large amounts of water, electricity and maintenance

Furniture.Name: Toilet
トイレ
Furniture.Description: Poop machine

Furniture.Name: Watercooler
ウォーターサーバー
Furniture.Description: A place for employees to socialize

Furniture.Name: Painting
絵画
Furniture.Description: A corny painting to liven up the office

Furniture.Name: Bookshelf
本棚
Furniture.Description: Complete with books!

Furniture.Name: Floor Plant
観葉植物
Furniture.Description: A charming floor plant

Furniture.Name: Table Plant
卓上盆栽
Furniture.Description: Low-poly bonsai tree

Furniture.Name: Big Plant
大きな植木
Furniture.Description: Takes up a lot of space, but employees agree that it makes up for it by looking nice

Furniture.Name: Small tree
小さな木
Furniture.Description: Place it at odd angles to make it look more varied. Seriously.

Furniture.Name: Clock
時計
Furniture.Description: Time machine!(Not an actual time machine)

Furniture.Name: Small Server
小型サーバ
Furniture.Description: A normal computer, but with more internet

Furniture.Name: Medium Server
Medium Server
Furniture.Description: Like a small server, but more medium

Furniture.Name: Tower Server
タワーサーバ
Furniture.Description: A high performance tower(Not an actual tower)

Furniture.Name: Server Rack
ラックサーバ
Furniture.Description: If one computer is not enough

Furniture.Name: Big Server Rack
Big Server Rack
Furniture.Description: When you can't get enough server

Furniture.Name: Phone
電話
Furniture.Description: Who you gonna call? Support!

Furniture.Name: Drawing Tablet
タブレット端末
Furniture.Description: So much easier than manually inputting pixel coordinates

Furniture.Name: Calculator
電卓
Furniture.Description: Calculators are a programmer's best friend

Furniture.Name: Inbox
メールボックス
Furniture.Description: Help keep your employees organized, especially helpful for people who haven't heard of e-mail

Furniture.Name: Small Product Printer
小型製品製造機
Furniture.Description: A small floppy printer to print your products

Furniture.Name: Pallet
倉庫
Furniture.Description: Can support up to 27 boxes with 1000 copies in each. Needs to be in the same room as a printer

Segment.Name: Sliding glass door
ガラス製ドア
Segment.Description: Door that doubles as a window

Segment.Name: Small window
小さな窓
Segment.Description: Completely useless if placed between rooms

Segment.Name: Large window
大きな窓
Segment.Description: If you want even more window
